code: import{NEW_TASK,REMOVE_TASK,FETCH_ALL_TASK}from'../actionTypes';export var getAllTask=function getAllTask(task){return{type:FETCH_ALL_TASK,payload:task};};export var newTask=function newTask(newtaskdata){return{type:NEW_TASK,payload:{newtaskdata:newtaskdata}};};export var removeTask=function removeTask(id){return{type:REMOVE_TASK,id:id};};
